resources.string: Artemis
The folder name to save the images you create with Artemis. If a folder with this name doesn't already exist it will be created for you.
Horizontal Lens Angle
Vertical Lens Angle
Quit
Click me to quit Artemis.
Issue / Feedback
Report and Issue or give us your feedback, we appreciate your comments.
About
A little about the app and its developers.
Email Support

string-array.name: longPressShutter_entries
string-array.item: Autofocus camera and immediately capture image
Autofocus camera and capture image on button release

string-array.name: volumeAction_entries
string-array.item: Autofocus camera and immediately capture image

resources.string: Camera device will NOT autofocus before taking each picture
Camera device will autofocus before taking each picture
Auto focus behaviour when long pressing the camera shutter (capture image) button.
Long Press Shutter Button Focus Behaviour
Camera device will use the torch while in preview mode
Camera device will NOT use the torch while in preview mode
Camera preview will show all colors
Camera preview will be black and white. Note: this will also affect saved images.
Device Camera Behaviour
Device Camera Sensor
Device Camera Angles
The application will use the custom values shown below.
The application will use the values automatically detected from the device (current values shown below).
Detect Device Camera Angles Automatically
Choose what to display in the heading of the main app.
Enable/Disable the Lens boxes from changing position on touch.
Lock Lens Boxes
Choose the behaviour of the Android back button while the main app is running.
Back Button Behaviour
Haptic Feedback
Artemis will NOT provide haptic feedback on button presses.
Artemis will provide haptic feedback on button presses.
The screen will be kept on and NEVER timeout while the main app is running.
The screen will timeout according to your devices default sleep setting.
Keep Screen On
GPS Settings
Screen Settings
User Interface Behaviour
GPS is disabled. The device will not search for it's location.
GPS is enabled and the device will search for it's location.
Key Mappings
Don't override volume key behavior. Volume keys behave as default.
"Override volume key behavior while the main app is running. "
Override Volume Key Behavior
Choose the behaviour when phones volume up key is pressed while the main app is running.
Volume Up Key Behaviour
Choose the behaviour when phones volume down key is pressed while the main app is running.
Volume Down Key Behaviour
NOTE: You must quit and restart the application for changes to take effect.
Picture Save Location
Select Image Size
Select the size of the final image saved to disk.
Saved Image Size
Select Image Quality
Select the quality (compression) of the image saved to disk.
Saved Image Quality
Images will NOT be smooth filtered.
A filter will be applied to make the images appear smoother when scaling is required.
An image preview will be shown after pictures are saved.
Quick pictures are enabled. An image preview will NOT be shown after pictures are saved.
